index.has-documents: You have submitted the following documents for the Canadian Dental Care Plan:
index.no-documents: You have not submitted any documents for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

error-message.applicant-required: Select a person from the drop down list.
error-message.invalid-file-type: The file type you're trying to upload is not supported. You can upload a file in one of the following formats: .docx, .ppt, .txt, .pdf, .jpg, .jpeg, .png
error-message.too-many-files: You can upload a maximum of 10 files at a time. Submit your current documents before uploading additional files.
error-message.file-too-large: The file you are trying to upload is too large. Make sure the file size is less than 5MB.

not-required.description: You do not need to upload any documents at this time.
